name: Kaveret
description: '''Kaveret''' ({{langx|he|כוורת}}, lit. "beehive"), also known as '''Poogy''' ({{langx|he|פוגי}}, nickname of band drummer [[Meir Fenigstein]] chosen for their performances abroad), was an Israeli [[pop rock]] band, which operated originally from 1973 to 1976. Representing Israel in the [[1974 Eurovision Song Contest]], its songs featured humorous lyrics and ironic musical references. Kaveret is widely considered a breakthrough band in Israeli rock and pop history, and its members have had notable solo careers.
